context_history.content: I want to learn about: css. DO NOT greet me. Immediately start lesson Step 1 by explaining the core concept on the whiteboard.

CSS, or Cascading Style Sheets, is the language used to describe the presentation of a web page. While HTML defines the structure (like bones), CSS defines the aesthetics (like skin, clothes, and colors).

visual_content.detail: HTML (Structure), CSS (Style), Web Page (Result), HTML provides the content while CSS applies the visual layer to create the final page.
